title: Bug 127070SVG small font is always antialiased
description: Bug 127070SVG small font is always antialiased
OB: SVG uses glyphs to render fonts, which cause small fonts tobe alwaysantialiased (making them slightly blurry), and "low quality SVG" (noantialiasing) text to be almost unreadable. As a more minor sideeffect thisalso causes the SVG source to be not very readable and large in size.
